classScheduleInformation: Non-music majors will be assessed a fee.
courseSectionInformation: Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. May be repeated to a maximum of 20 hours. Prerequisite: Graduate standing in music, or successful completion of a qualifying audition for the string faculty; concurrent registration in MUS 450, section K, for students in the Master of Music curriculum in strings.
